name.ca: Fons de Bola de Drac Súper
name.es: Dragon Ball Super Fondo de pantalla
name.it: Sfondo di sfera del drago Super
name.ja: ドラゴンボール超壁紙
name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Papel de Parede Super Esferas do Dragão

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Dragon Ball Super wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Dragon Ball Super background. Dragon Ball Super theme for anime fans.
short.ca: Dragon Ball Super Wallpaper canvia la pestanya nova amb el fons de pantalla HD Dragon Ball Super. Per als fans de Dragon Ball Super.
short.de: Dragon Ball Super Hintergrundbild Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit HD Dragon Ball Super Hintergrundbild ändern.
short.es: La extensión Dragon Ball Super Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo de pantalla Dragon Ball Super HD.
short.fr: L'extension Dragon Ball Super Wallpaper change un nouvel onglet avec un fond d'écran HD Dragon Ball Super.
short.it: L'estensione dello sfondo del sfera del drago cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo dello sfondo del Dragon Ball Super HD.
short.ja: ドラゴンボール超壁紙拡張機能は、HDドラゴンボール超壁紙の背景で新しいタブを変更します。ドラゴンボール超ファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 애니메이션 배경 화면 확장은 HD 애니메이션 배경 화면 배경으로 새 탭을 변경합니다. 애니메이션 팬을위한 테마.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão do Dragon Ball Super Wallpaper muda a nova guia com o fundo do HD Dragon Ball Super. Temas para fãs de Dragon Ball Super.
short.zh_CN: 七龙珠超壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为七龙珠超的背景壁纸。七龙珠超粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 七龍珠超壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為七龍珠超的背景壁紙。七龍珠超粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Dragon Ball Super wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Dragon Ball Super background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Dragon Ball Super new tab.
